items.title: Russian wagon production plummets
items.excerpt: WAGON production in Russia dropped by 21% to 37,900 units during the first eight months of 2025, a trend that is accelerating, according to the Russian Association of Wagon Builders.

items.title: Keolis wins Pune metro operating contract

items.title: DB Cargo sells stake in Spain’s Transfesa

items.title: ProRail signs viaduct repair design deal
